title: HELP ME
body: I CANT PLAY BECAUSE I PRESSED TO UPGRADE THE NEW CLIENT BUT MY COMPUTER DOESNT HAVE ENOUGH SPACE.. AND NOW I CANT CANCELL IT... HELP PLIZ!!!!

replies.body:
I'd recommend either clearing up space on your PC by deleting/moving some files or using an app like [CCleaner](https://www.piriform.com/ccleaner) to get rid of temp files and delete caches. Alternatively, you may be able to bypass the upgrade by launching the **lol.launcher.admin.exe** file from inside your League directory (C:\Riot Games\ League of Legends).

Let me know if this helped!
